sourcesContent:
import React, { FC } from 'react' import './style.css' interface FontCardProps { title: string, author: string, sampleText: string fontSize: string } const FontCard: FC = (props: FontCardProps) => { const { title, author, sampleText, fontSize } = props return (

{title}

{author}

{sampleText || "Don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out your own inner voice."}

) } export default FontCard
